glsa.title: Puppet Server and Agent: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Puppet Server and Agent, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: Puppet Agent contains Puppetâ€™s main code and all of the dependencies needed to run it, including Facter, Hiera, and bundled versions of Ruby and OpenSSL.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Puppet Server and Agent. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Remote attackers, impersonating a trusted broker, could potentially execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
